name: YOUR TIME
description:
The time demon waits at the bottom of the third floor. Find your way down there and show 'em what you're made of.

WASD to move, Space to attack.

Team Members:

  • M7rk (@msevenrk) - Lead Developer and Programmer
  • Young Jacob (@YoungJacobArt) - Programmer
  • JomoOval (@JomoOval) - Programmer
  • Capital (@Capital_EKS) - Artist
  • Demensa (@DemensaMusic) - Composer

Note - An update was made a few hours after the jam to fix a game-breaking bug involving doors.
